Warehouse Assistant Job at C.don Communication Limited




        
    

        
        C.don communication Ltd is one of the major distributors of Itel phones and accesories, we have our head office at computer village lagos and branch office at Banex plaze wuse 2 Abuja.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Assistant
Job Location: Alaba Intl. Market, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Supervise goods received from the vendors
	Mainting checks on inwards and outwards of goods from the warehouse
	To master the company internal control system of inventory management
	To ensure the company branches and customers are well supplied
	To adequate security of the warehouse
	To prepare stock movement report


Requirements and Skills


	OND and SSCE, e.g. Bsc/HND is an added advantage.
	The applicant must male, and resided with Alaba Lagos area.


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: Linkcogadgets@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Quality Assurance Manager",
  "description": "BeeEx HR Consulting is a dynamic and forward-thinking human resource consulting firm committed to delivering tailored, end-to-end HR solutions that empower businesses to attract, develop, and retain top talent. With a deep understanding of diverse industry landscapes, BeeEx HR Consulting partners with organizations to optimize their people strategy, enhance operational efficiency, and drive sustainable growth.

Our core services include talent acquisition and recruitment, HR advisory, performance management systems, learning and development, organizational structuring, and compliance support. We pride ourselves on our client-centric approach, combining strategic insight with practical solutions to meet the evolving needs of modern workplaces.

At BeeEx HR Consulting, we operate with professionalism, integrity, and excellence, providing measurable value and fostering long-term partnerships that elevate both people and performance.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Assurance Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki,&nbsp;Lagos
Reports To: Head of Operations/Director of Projects

Job Summary


	The Quality Assurance Manager ensures that all real estate development projects, property services and internal operations comply with company quality standards, regulatory requirements, and client expectations.
	This role is responsible for developing, implementing and monitoring quality assurance systems, inspecting ongoing and completed work, and coordinating with relevant teams to maintain the highest standards across construction, property management and service delivery.


Key Responsibilities
Quality Standard Implementation:


	Develop and enforce quality assurance policies
	Ensure compliance with real estate regulatory and safety standards.
	Establish inspection schedules and quality benchmarks for construction and maintenance.


Project Monitoring Evaluation:


	Conduct regular site visits and audits to inspect project progress, workmanship, adherence to specifications.
	Identify potential risks or defects and recommend corrective measures.


Process Improvement:


	Analyze workflow process and suggest improvement for efficiency and effectiveness
	Work closely with design, and operations teams to embed quality checks at each stage of the project lifecycle.


Training and development:


	Train internal teams and contractors on quality protocols and safety practices.
	Ensure staff understand and follow all quality assurance guidelines


Documentation and Reporting:


	Maintained detailed records of inspections, audits and compliance reports.
	Provide regular updates and quality performance report to senior management.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Number of quality related issues detected and resolved
	Compliance rate with regulatory and internal quality standards
	Reduction in rework or defect rate on construction projects.
	Timely delivery of quality audit and inspection reports.
	Client satisfaction ratings related to project quality.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, Architecture, Quality Assurance (e.g ISO 9001, Six Sigma)
	5+ years of experience in quality control or assurance, preferably within the real estate or construction industry&nbsp;
	Experience with project management, building codes and regulatory compliance.


Skills and Competencies:


	Strong analytical and problem solving skills
	Excellent attention to details
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Proficient in quality management software and tools
	Strong leadership and team coordination abilities.


Method of Application

Quality Assurance Manager Job at BeeEx HR Consulting




        
    

        
        BeeEx HR Consulting is a dynamic and forward-thinking human resource consulting firm committed to delivering tailored, end-to-end HR solutions that empower businesses to attract, develop, and retain top talent. With a deep understanding of diverse industry landscapes, BeeEx HR Consulting partners with organizations to optimize their people strategy, enhance operational efficiency, and drive sustainable growth.

At BeeEx HR Consulting, we operate with professionalism, integrity, and excellence, providing measurable value and fostering long-term partnerships that elevate both people and performance.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Assurance Manager

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Reports To: Head of Operations/Director of Projects

Job Summary


	The Quality Assurance Manager ensures that all real estate development projects, property services and internal operations comply with company quality standards, regulatory requirements, and client expectations.
	This role is responsible for developing, implementing and monitoring quality assurance systems, inspecting ongoing and completed work, and coordinating with relevant teams to maintain the highest standards across construction, property management and service delivery.


Key Responsibilities
Quality Standard Implementation:


	Develop and enforce quality assurance policies
	Ensure compliance with real estate regulatory and safety standards.
	Establish inspection schedules and quality benchmarks for construction and maintenance.


Project Monitoring Evaluation:


	Conduct regular site visits and audits to inspect project progress, workmanship, adherence to specifications.
	Identify potential risks or defects and recommend corrective measures.


Process Improvement:


	Analyze workflow process and suggest improvement for efficiency and effectiveness
	Work closely with design, and operations teams to embed quality checks at each stage of the project lifecycle.


Training and development:


	Train internal teams and contractors on quality protocols and safety practices.
	Ensure staff understand and follow all quality assurance guidelines


Documentation and Reporting:


	Maintained detailed records of inspections, audits and compliance reports.
	Provide regular updates and quality performance report to senior management.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Number of quality related issues detected and resolved
	Compliance rate with regulatory and internal quality standards
	Reduction in rework or defect rate on construction projects.
	Timely delivery of quality audit and inspection reports.
	Client satisfaction ratings related to project quality.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, Architecture, Quality Assurance (e.g ISO 9001, Six Sigma)
	5+ years of experience in quality control or assurance, preferably within the real estate or construction industry 
	Experience with project management, building codes and regulatory compliance.


Skills and Competencies:


	Strong analytical and problem solving skills
	Excellent attention to details
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Proficient in quality management software and tools
	Strong leadership and team coordination abilities.


Method of Application
